topic.title: ZeroNet+Docker+Raspberry+TiddlyWiki = Heaven
topic.body: Didn't test yet but sounds like it http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PwBECmfUmT4mcacoMUsCvhueDYQoRJSzr

topic.title: seems like ZenoNet does not like white spaces or %20 on the file/url
topic.body:
my static file generator generated some files with white spaces on the file name

http://zeronet.crypt.cat:8080/1PwBECmfUmT4mcacoMUsCvhueDYQoRJSzr/Video_Stream_ZeroNet+bitport.io.html

VS

http://zeronet.crypt.cat:8080/1PwBECmfUmT4mcacoMUsCvhueDYQoRJSzr/Video%20Stream%20ZeroNet+bitport.io.html

they both exist

2_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ.body: proxies nice to browse with regular tor browser =D

> [b3nis](#comment_14_1HwYER58xAxchBDL6WKRqKuPZzmwSvMwjY): Zeronet's Tor support works just fine.
> For vpn tunnel proxy I'd suggest mullvad.

you could use the proxy to post on twitter and make this thing blowup

3_13vL6ARzDm7215jaRjFvAATfkxBriSnGmb.body:
> [musickiller](#comment_29_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ): Not Found

it's taking some time for my updates to appear

looks like ZeroNet does not like white spaces
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PwBECmfUmT4mcacoMUsCvhueDYQoRJSzr/Video_Stream_ZeroNet+bitport.io.html
force the update

> [musickiller](#comment_30_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ): cool!! what's bitport?

https://bitport.io it's a webservice that lets you upload torrents to a server a stream them after

> [musickiller](#comment_31_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ): a centralized P2P? are you kidding? xDD Sure it's cool but it's exactly the opposite thing to what ppl are usually trying to achive here =D

Good point =P
should we port bitport to ZeroNet ?

4_13vL6ARzDm7215jaRjFvAATfkxBriSnGmb.body:
> [gruntbull](#comment_2_1M1BRdWmEs2Y3iLyseGEYMRsra2qdAG5ym): Off-topic, is it possible to clone a Tiddlywiki site on ZN?

the download button is not working
i'm just editing them off line
